member.name: P:Sdl.Community.GroupShareKit.Http.IConnection.Credentials
member.summary: Gets or sets the credentials used by the connection.
member.remarks: You can use this property if you only have a single hard-coded credential. Otherwise, pass in an to the constructor. Setting this property will change the to use the default with just these credentials.
